code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../styling/style.sass';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventsPage=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[expandedId,setExpandedId]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const now=new Date();const storedEvents=localStorage.getItem('events');if(storedEvents){const parsed=JSON.parse(storedEvents);const eventsArray=parsed.events||[];const filteredEvents=eventsArray.filter(event=>new Date(event.endTime)>now);setEvents(filteredEvents);}},[]);const toggleExpand=id=>{setExpandedId(prev=>prev===id?null:id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"events-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Upcoming Events"}),events.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No upcoming events."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-cards",children:events.map(event=>{const isExpanded=expandedId===event.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>toggleExpand(event.id),className:"event-card ".concat(isExpanded?'expanded':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[new Date(event.startTime).toLocaleString()," \u2013",' ',new Date(event.endTime).toLocaleString()]}),isExpanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description})]})]},event.id);})})]});};export default EventsPage;
